# docs - improve README with professional layout, Docker setup instructions, and status badges

## Changes

Improve README documentation with professional layout and better organization.

### What changed:
- Add comprehensive status badges (CI, Docker Build, Codecov, Docker Pulls, Issues, Stars)
- Reorganize content into clear sections (About, Installation, Configuration)
- Simplify Docker and Docker Compose installation instructions

- Update repository URLs to ferrous-networking/Ferrous-DNS
- Remove redundant sections and improve overall readability

### Badges added:
